::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mean = 100 
sdX = 10
sd_X = 100/sqrt(16)

curve(dnorm(x, mean, sdX), ylab = "dnorm(x)", from=60, to=140, col="blue")
curve(dnorm(x, mean, sd_X), from=60, to=140, add=TRUE, col="red")
```
